ARABIC: لَّقَدْ كَانَ فِى يُوسُفَ وَإِخْوَتِهِۦٓ ءَايَٰتٌ لِّلسَّآئِلِينَ

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: In Yusuf and his brothers there are Signs for every one of those who wants to ask.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: In the story of Joseph and his brothers are lessons for those who inquire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Verily in the story of Joseph and his brothers there are many signs for those who inquire (about the truth).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: In the story of Joseph and his brothers, there is evidence (of the truth) for those who seek to know.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: Indeed in Yusuf and his brothers are signs* for those who enquire**. (* Of the truthfulness of Prophet Mohammed – peace and blessings be upon him. ** The Jews who enquired about their story.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: Verily, in Yusuf and his brethren there were Ayat for those who ask.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: Certainly in Yusuf and his brothers there are signs for the inquirers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: (In Joseph and his brethren were signs for those who ask questions.)
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: Verily in Joseph and his brethren are signs (of Allah's Sovereignty) for the inquiring.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Surely, in Joseph and his brothers there are signs for the inquirers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Assuredly in Yusuf and his brethren there have been signs for the inquirers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: In Joseph and his brothers there are certainly signs for the seekers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: Verily in Joseph and his brethren are signs (or symbols) for seekers (after Truth).
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: Verily, in Yusuf (Joseph) and his brethren, there were Ayat (proofs, evidences, verses, lessons, signs, revelations, etc.) for those who ask.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: Indeed, in Joseph and his brothers there were signs for those who inquire.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: In Joseph and his brothers are lessons for the seekers.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: Certainly were there in Joseph and his brothers signs for those who ask,
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [12:7] Verily in, the tale of, Joseph and his brethren — who were eleven — are signs, lessons, for those who inquire, about their tale.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (Verily in Joseph) in the narrative of Joseph (and his brethren are signs (of Allah's Sovereignty)) lessons (for the inquiring) about his story. This verse was revealed about a Jewish rabbi.
